I love helping people reach their full potential in writing, and I'd love to be able to read some of your work while I edit it!
Flexible in everything, from communication to duration of your project!

abstrac: Our goal is to help you grow your company and focus on your core business whereas we take care of the rest
bio:
The name is Marc Oliver David Ruprecht. Pleased to meet you!

Since 2021, I am living in Paraguay, a marvelous country in Latin America. Here, I am working as an independent business consultant.

Before that and after finishing my studies in business administration at the university of Bern (Switzerland), I have been working for several years as an associate and CEO in the Swiss industry and later as a business consultant together with a close friend and business partner.


CAREER

commercial assistant in a family enterprise (2001 – 2006)

Partner and commercial director of a metal processing company with establishments in Switzerland and England (2006 – 2016)

Independent Business consultant and Office assistant, specializing in small enterprises (since 2017)


EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE

Swiss Gymnasium with “Matura” (equivalent to an American High School graduation)

Bachelor of Business Administration at the University of Bern, focus on Marketing and Entrepreneurship

Advanced training in Corporate Governance at the Institute for leadership and HRM of the University of St. Gallen

Advanced knowledge in web design (WordPress) and graphic design (Affinity)

Advanced MacOSX knowledge, including Mac-Office (Pages, Numbers, and Keynote) as well as MS Office for Mac (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint)

experienced user of ERP systems (Blue Office, Bexio, and Banana)

Office hours: Monday to Friday, 8 am to 12 am and 1 pm to 5 pm EST

For further information, please check out https://ruprecht-management.ch/prices
